title: STT 475
text:
R
To download R, go to CRAN, https://cloud.r-project.org. Get the latest version.

title: STT 475
text:
RStudio
RStudio is an integrated development environment, or IDE, for R programming, Download it from https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/.

title: 1  R Basics
text:
1.1 Basic Calculator
R can be used as a calculator. Enter the following in the console.

2 + 2

[1] 4


When we assign a value to a variable.

n <- 20

title: 1  R Basics
text:
1.2 Vector
The following defines a vector in R.

x <- c(1,2,-3,5)
x

[1]  1  2 -3  5
